data.title: Joe Martin
data.meta_description: Dr. Joseph "Joe" Martin Sr. is a fictional character on the ABC daytime soap opera All My Children. ﻿Ray MacDonnell (01/1970-01/2010 & 04/2013-09/2013; contract & 03/2011 & 09/2011; recurring) ﻿Joseph Henry Martin Sr. (full name)
